title: Can't connect to chat/friends list but can queue for games
body: Have tried restarting, repairing client, uninstalling/reinstalling, using different computers, using different wifi connections, using different accounts, nothing works

replies.body:
yeah its the same for me.

i also just had a 8 bot aram game

and a 15 minute queue i gave up on
Across 2 accounts, I'm experiencing the issue on only 1. Seems like it may be "isolated", in a sense, to only part of the OCE player-base.
Yeah me too, and a friend who I spoke to. Looks like there's a server problem?
that also happened to me, unbelievable.
